casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Derick K. Purefoy (7833)

Nokcott, Laveey and Landau, Js.

Argued May 4 decision released May 10, 1990 M. FredDeCaprio, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). RitaM. Shair, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom were JohnM. Bailey, state’s attorney, and, on the brief, Herbert Carlson, senior assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
